pageTitle: Itinerary for Saturday, October 29, 2016 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Saturday, October 29, 2016:

Ottawa, Ontario

8:45 p.m. The Prime Minister will depart for Brussels, Kingdom of Belgium.

Canada Reception Centre
Hangar 11
190 Convair Private
Ottawa, Ontario

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity only
  • Media should arrive no later than 8 p.m.


PMO Media Relations:
Media@pmo-cpm.gc.ca
613-957-5555
